absorb.name: Absorb
absorb.description: Restores the user's HP by 1/2 of the damage inflicted on the target.

acid.name: Acid
acid.description: Has a ~10% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

acidarmor.name: Acid Armor
acidarmor.description: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.

agility.name: Agility
agility.description: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages.

amnesia.name: Amnesia
amnesia.description: Raises the user's Special by 2 stages.

aurorabeam.name: Aurora Beam
aurorabeam.description: Has a ~10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.

barrage.name: Barrage
barrage.description: Attacks 2-5 times in one turn; if one of these attacks breaks a target's Substitute, the target will take damage for the rest of the hits. This move has a 3/8 chance to hit twice, a 3/8 chance to hit three times, a 1/8 chance to hit four times and a 1/8 chance to hit five times.

barrier.name: Barrier
barrier.description: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.

bide.name: Bide
bide.description: The user absorbs all damage for 2-3 turns and then inflicts twice the absorbed damage on its target. This move ignores the target's type but still cannot hit Ghost-type Pokemon.

bind.name: Bind
bind.description: The user becomes uncontrollable and attacks for 2-5 consecutive turns; the target cannot make attacks of its own during this time, but it may switch out, use items or run away.

blizzard.name: Blizzard
blizzard.description: Has a ~10% chance to freeze the target.

bodyslam.name: Body Slam
bodyslam.description: Has a ~30% chance to paralyze the target.

boneclub.name: Bone Club
boneclub.description: Has a ~10% chance to make the target flinch.

bonemerang.name: Bonemerang
bonemerang.description: Strikes twice; if the first hit breaks the target's Substitute, the real Pokemon will take damage from the second hit.

bubble.name: Bubble
bubble.description: Has a ~10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

bubblebeam.name: Bubblebeam
bubblebeam.description: Has a ~10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

clamp.name: Clamp
clamp.description: The user becomes uncontrollable and attacks for 2-5 consecutive turns; the target cannot make attacks of its own during this time, but it may switch out, use items or run away.

cometpunch.name: Comet Punch
cometpunch.description: Attacks 2-5 times in one turn; if one of these attacks breaks a target's Substitute, the target will take damage for the rest of the hits. This move has a 3/8 chance to hit twice, a 3/8 chance to hit three times, a 1/8 chance to hit four times and a 1/8 chance to hit five times.

confusion.name: Confusion
confusion.description: Has a ~10% chance to confuse the target.

constrict.name: Constrict
constrict.description: Has a ~10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

conversion.name: Conversion
conversion.description: The user's type changes to match the type of one of its four attacks. This move fails if the user cannot change its type under this condition.

counter.name: Counter
counter.description: Almost always goes last; if an opponent strikes with a Normal- or Fighting-type attack before the user's turn, the user retaliates for twice the damage it had endured.

crabhammer.name: Crabhammer
crabhammer.description: Has a high critical hit ratio.

defensecurl.name: Defense Curl
defensecurl.description: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage.

dig.name: Dig
dig.description: On the first turn, the user digs underground, becoming uncontrollable, and evades all attacks. Swift may still hit a Pokemon underground. On the second turn, the user attacks.

disable.name: Disable
disable.description: One randomly selected move of the target's cannot be selected for 1-7 turns. Disable only works on one move at a time. The target does nothing if it is about to use a move that becomes disabled.

doublekick.name: Double Kick
doublekick.description: Strikes twice; if the first hit breaks the target's Substitute, the real Pokemon will take damage from the second hit.

doubleteam.name: Double Team
doubleteam.description: Raises the user's Evasion by 1 stage.

doubleslap.name: Doubleslap
doubleslap.description: Attacks 2-5 times in one turn; if one of these attacks breaks a target's Substitute, the target will take damage for the rest of the hits. This move has a 3/8 chance to hit twice, a 3/8 chance to hit three times, a 1/8 chance to hit four times and a 1/8 chance to hit five times.

dreameater.name: Dream Eater
dreameater.description: Restores the user's HP by 1/2 of the damage inflicted on the target but only works on a sleeping target.

ember.name: Ember
ember.description: Has a ~10% chance to burn the target.

explosion.name: Explosion
explosion.description: The Defense stat of other Pokemon is halved against this attack, essentially doubling the move's base power; causes the user to faint.

fireblast.name: Fire Blast
fireblast.description: Has a ~30% chance to burn the target.

firepunch.name: Fire Punch
firepunch.description: Has a ~10% chance to burn the target.

firespin.name: Fire Spin
firespin.description: The user becomes uncontrollable and attacks for 2-5 consecutive turns; the target cannot make attacks of its own during this time, but it may switch out, use items or run away.

fissure.name: Fissure
fissure.description: The target faints; doesn't work on faster or higher-leveled Pokemon.

flamethrower.name: Flamethrower
flamethrower.description: Has a ~10% chance to burn the target.

flash.name: Flash
flash.description: Lowers the target's Accuracy by 1 stage.

fly.name: Fly
fly.description: On the first turn, the user flies into the air, becoming uncontrollable, and evades most attacks. Swift may still hit a Pokemon in the air. On the second turn, the user attacks.

focusenergy.name: Focus Energy
focusenergy.description: Decreases critical hit ratio in-game, but raises it in Pokemon Stadium.

fury.name: Fury
fury.description: Attack Attacks 2-5 times in one turn; if one of these attacks breaks a target's Substitute, the target will take damage for the rest of the hits. This move has a 3/8 chance to hit twice, a 3/8 chance to hit three times, a 1/8 chance to hit four times and a 1/8 chance to hit five times.

furyswipes.name: Fury Swipes
furyswipes.description: Attacks 2-5 times in one turn; if one of these attacks breaks a target's Substitute, the target will take damage for the rest of the hits. This move has a 3/8 chance to hit twice, a 3/8 chance to hit three times, a 1/8 chance to hit four times and a 1/8 chance to hit five times.

glare.name: Glare
glare.description: Paralyzes the target. This move works on Ghost-type Pokemon.

growl.name: Growl
growl.description: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.

growth.name: Growth
growth.description: Raises the user's Special by 1 stage.

guillotine.name: Guillotine
guillotine.description: The target faints; doesn't work on faster or higher-leveled Pokemon.

harden.name: Harden
harden.description: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage.

haze.name: Haze
haze.description: Eliminates any stat modifiers from all active Pokemon. Also removes Leech Seed, Reflect and Light Screen from either Pokemon and cures the opponent of any status conditions (including Toxic). If the user of Haze has Toxic poisoning, it will be downgraded to regular poisoning.

headbutt.name: Headbutt
headbutt.description: Has a ~30% chance to make the target flinch.

hijump kick.name: Hi Jump Kick
hijump kick.description: If this attack misses the target, the user receives 1 HP of damage.

horndrill.name: Horn Drill
horndrill.description: The target faints; doesn't work on faster or higher-leveled Pokemon.

hyperbeam.name: Hyper Beam
hyperbeam.description: In Stadium, the user becomes uncontrollable during its next turn. Otherwise, the user attacks on turn one but it doesn't recharge on turn two if it KOs the target, breaks its Substitute or misses entirely.

hyperfang.name: Hyper Fang
hyperfang.description: Has a ~10% chance to make the target flinch.

icebeam.name: Ice Beam
icebeam.description: Has a ~10% chance to freeze the target.

icepunch.name: Ice Punch
icepunch.description: Has a ~10% chance to freeze the target.

jumpkick.name: Jump Kick
jumpkick.description: If this attack misses the target, the user receives 1 HP of damage.

karatechop.name: Karate Chop
karatechop.description: Has a high critical hit ratio.

kinesis.name: Kinesis
kinesis.description: Lowers the target's Accuracy by 1 stage.

leechlife.name: Leech Life
leechlife.description: Restores the user's HP by 1/2 of the damage inflicted on the target.

leechseed.name: Leech Seed
leechseed.description: The user steals 1/16 of the target's max HP (or more if used in conjunction with Toxic) until either Pokemon uses Haze or the target is switched out or KO'ed; does not work on Grass-type Pokemon, but will work against Pokemon behind Substitutes.

leer.name: Leer
leer.description: Lowers the target's Defense by 1 stage.

lick.name: Lick
lick.description: Has a ~30% chance to paralyze the target. This move fails against Psychic-type Pokemon.

lightscreen.name: Light Screen
lightscreen.description: The user receives 1/2 damage from Special attacks until it switches out or either Pokemon uses Haze.

lowkick.name: Low Kick
lowkick.description: Has a ~30% chance to make the target flinch.

meditate.name: Meditate
meditate.description: Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.

megadrain.name: Mega Drain
megadrain.description: Restores the user's HP by 1/2 of the damage inflicted on the target.

metronome.name: Metronome
metronome.description: The user performs a randomly selected move; almost any move in the game could be picked. Metronome cannot generate itself, Struggle or any move that the user already knows.

mimic.name: Mimic
mimic.description: This move is temporarily replaced by one of the target's moves; after one PP is subtracted to use this move, the replacement move will retain Mimic's remaining PP. The user can select any of the target's moves to copy until the end of the battle or until the user switches out. There are no move restrictions on Mimic other than itself and Struggle. However, in a link battle, Mimic will copy one of the target's attacks randomly.

minimize.name: Minimize
minimize.description: Raises the user's Evasion by 1 stage.

mirror.name: Mirror
mirror.description: Move The user performs the last move executed by its target; if applicable, an attack's damage is calculated with the user's stats, level and type(s). This moves fails if the target has not yet used a move. Mirror Move also cannot copy itself.

mist.name: Mist
mist.description: Protects the user from negative stat modifiers caused by other Pokemon until it switches out. The user's Accuracy and Evasion stats are also protected. Moves that cause negative stat modifiers as a secondary effect, such as Psychic, still deal their regular damage.

nightshade.name: Night Shade
nightshade.description: Does damage equal to user's level. This move hits Normal-type Pokemon.

payday.name: Pay Day
payday.description: The player picks up extra money after in-game battles; the money received is equal to: [user's level * 2 * number of times Pay Day is used]. The player does not lose money if the opponent uses Pay Day but the player wins the battle.

petaldance.name: Petal Dance
petaldance.description: The user attacks uncontrollably for 2-3 turns and then gets confused.

pinmissile.name: Pin Missile
pinmissile.description: Attacks 2-5 times in one turn; if one of these attacks breaks a target's Substitute, the target will take damage for the rest of the hits. This move has a 3/8 chance to hit twice, a 3/8 chance to hit three times, a 1/8 chance to hit four times and a 1/8 chance to hit five times.

poisonsting.name: Poison Sting
poisonsting.description: Has a ~20% chance to poison the target.

psybeam.name: Psybeam
psybeam.description: Has a ~10% chance to confuse the target.

psychic.name: Psychic
psychic.description: Has a ~30% chance to lower the target's Special by 1 stage.

psywave.name: Psywave
psywave.description: Randomly inflicts set damage between a minimum of 1 HP and a maximum of [1.5x the user's level] HP.

rage.name: Rage
rage.description: The user attacks uncontrollably until it faints or its target faints. During this time, the user's Attack increases by 1 stage for each time it is hit by the target. If this move misses, the user continues to attack but has only a 1/256 chance to land a hit.

razorleaf.name: Razor Leaf
razorleaf.description: Has a high critical hit ratio.

razorwind.name: Razor Wind
razorwind.description: The user prepares on turn one, becoming uncontrollable, and then attacks on turn two.

recover.name: Recover
recover.description: Restores 1/2 of the user's max HP. However, this move fails if the user's current HP is 511 or 255 HP below its value at full health.

reflect.name: Reflect
reflect.description: The user receives 1/2 damage from Physical attacks until it switches out or either Pokemon uses Haze.

rest.name: Rest
rest.description: The user is cured of status effects (and confusion), and recovers full HP, but falls asleep for 2 turns (and then uses a third turn to wake up). However, this move fails if the user's current HP is 511 or 255 HP below its value at full health.

roar.name: Roar
roar.description: Escapes from wild battles; fails automatically in trainer and link battles.

rollingkick.name: Rolling Kick
rollingkick.description: Has a ~30% chance to make the target flinch.

sandattack.name: Sand-Attack
sandattack.description: Lowers the target's Accuracy by 1 stage.

screech.name: Screech
screech.description: Lowers the target's Defense by 2 stages.

seismictoss.name: Seismic Toss
seismictoss.description: Does damage equal to user's level. Hits Ghost-type Pokemon.

selfdestruct.name: Selfdestruct
selfdestruct.description: The Defense stat of other Pokemon is halved against this attack, essentially doubling the move's base power; causes the user to faint.

sharpen.name: Sharpen
sharpen.description: Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.

skullbash.name: Skull Bash
skullbash.description: The user prepares on turn one, becoming uncontrollable, and then attacks on turn two.

skyattack.name: Sky Attack
skyattack.description: The user prepares on turn one, becoming uncontrollable, and then attacks on turn two.

slash.name: Slash
slash.description: Has a high critical hit ratio.

sludge.name: Sludge
sludge.description: Has a ~30% chance to poison the target.

smog.name: Smog
smog.description: Has a ~30% chance to poison the target.

smokescreen.name: Smokescreen
smokescreen.description: Lowers the target's Accuracy by 1 stage.

softboiled.name: Softboiled
softboiled.description: Restores 1/2 of the user's max HP. However, this move fails if the user's current HP is 511 or 255 HP below its value at full health.

solarbeam.name: Solar Beam
solarbeam.description: The user prepares on turn one, becoming uncontrollable, and then attacks on turn two.

spikecannon.name: Spike Cannon
spikecannon.description: Attacks 2-5 times in one turn; if one of these attacks breaks a target's Substitute, the target will take damage for the rest of the hits. This move has a 3/8 chance to hit twice, a 3/8 chance to hit three times, a 1/8 chance to hit four times and a 1/8 chance to hit five times.

splash.name: Splash
splash.description: Doesn't do anything (but we still love it).

stomp.name: Stomp
stomp.description: Has a ~30% chance to make the target flinch.

stringshot.name: String Shot
stringshot.description: Lowers the target's Speed by 1 stage.

struggle.name: Struggle
struggle.description: Used automatically when all of the user's other moves have run out of PP or are otherwise inaccessible. The user receives 1/4 recoil damage. Struggle is classified as a Normal-type move, so it is resisted by Rock-type Pokemon and cannot hit Ghost-type Pokemon at all.

substitute.name: Substitute
substitute.description: The user takes one-fourth of its maximum HP to create a substitute; this move fails if the user does not have enough HP for this. Until the substitute is broken, it receives damage from all attacks made by other Pokemon. In-game, the user can still be inflicted with status effects and stat modifiers from other Pokemon, but this is fixed in Pokemon Stadium. If a Substitute breaks from a hit during a multistrike move such as Fury Attack, the user takes damage from the remaining strikes.

superfang.name: Super Fang
superfang.description: This move halves the target's current HP.

swift.name: Swift
swift.description: Ignores Evasion and Accuracy modifiers and will hit Pokemon even if they are in the middle of Fly or Dig. Has a 1-in-256 chance of missing.

swords.name: Swords
swords.description: Dance Raises the user's Attack by 2 stages.

tailwhip.name: Tail Whip
tailwhip.description: Lowers the target's Defense by 1 stage.

teleport.name: Teleport
teleport.description: Escapes from wild battles; fails automatically in trainer and link battles.

thrash.name: Thrash
thrash.description: The user attacks uncontrollably for 2-3 turns and then gets confused.

thunder.name: Thunder
thunder.description: Has a ~10% chance to paralyze the target.

thunderbolt.name: Thunderbolt
thunderbolt.description: Has a ~10% chance to paralyze the target.

thunderpunch.name: Thunderpunch
thunderpunch.description: Has a ~10% chance to paralyze the target.

thundershock.name: Thundershock
thundershock.description: Has a ~10% chance to paralyze the target.

toxic.name: Toxic
toxic.description: The target is badly poisoned, with the damage caused by poison doubling after each turn. However, Toxic poisoning will revert to normal poisoning if the poisoned Pokemon is switched out or uses Haze. Damage caused by Leech Seed will also increase as Toxic damage increases.

transform.name: Transform
transform.description: The user morphs into a near-exact copy of the target. Stats, stat modifiers, type, moves and appearance are changed; the user's level and HP remain the same and each copied move receives only 5 PP.

twineedle.name: Twineedle
twineedle.description: Strikes twice; if the first hit breaks the target's Substitute, the real Pokemon will take damage from the second hit. Has a ~20% chance to poison the target .

whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
whirlwind.description: Escapes from wild battles; fails automatically in trainer and link battles.

withdraw.name: Withdraw
withdraw.description: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage.

wrap.name: Wrap
wrap.description: The user becomes uncontrollable and attacks for 2-5 consecutive turns; the target cannot make attacks of its own during this time, but it may switch out, use items or run away.
